questions.question: What do you mainly need the laptop for?
options: For everyday tasks (browsing, movies, office work)
For gaming or watching high-quality videos
For design, video editing, or creative work

questions.question: What type of processor do you prefer?
options: Basic – for light use (Intel i3 / Ryzen 3)
Medium – for smooth multitasking (Intel i5 / Ryzen 5)
Powerful – for heavy work or gaming (Intel i7 / Ryzen 7 or above)

questions.question: How much memory (RAM) do you prefer?
options: 32GB or more (For professional or creative work)

questions.question: Do you need a graphics card?
options: Yes, for gaming, video editing, or graphics-heavy work

questions.question: What screen size do you prefer?
options: Large (17 inches or more, for bigger display)

questions.question: How important is battery life to you?
Do you prefer a lightweight or heavy laptop?
What matters most to you while choosing a laptop?
Any other preferences? (Example: touchscreen, color, 2-in-1, stylus support, etc.)
